rewards.description:
Marbles on Stream is the most welcoming stream interactive experience where a streamer can run the game and welcome anyone in their chat to participate with "!play". That's it!

Join in for exclusive prizes and keep an eye on our for how we evolve this event in the future. If you need assistance please join our discord. Discord.gg/pixelbypixelstudios

rewards.description: Mother Machine is a co-op action platformer where little gremlins with an affinity for mischief and chaos team up to explore colorful alien caves. During the Couch Coop Fest from the 10th to 17th of February, we're giving away the Gremlin Constructor Hat for all the hardworking gremlins out there!  Mother is looking forward to welcoming you in the caves...

rewards.description: Starting in Split 1, Riot Games is introducing Twitch Subscriptions to select LoL Esports broadcast channels! This new initiative offers fans an enhanced viewing experience while providing direct support to their favorite leagues and teams. Subscribers with paid and gifted Tier 1 subscriptions will unlock exclusive in-game rewards through Twitchs Drop Fest. Subscribers can earn the special Why Though? emote by subscribing to participating channels.
rewards.name: Subs Launch - Drop Fest 2

rewards.description: Once Human Valentine's Day Drops event will start from February 14, 2025 to March 11, 2025 (PT).  Connect your Once Human character and Twitch account to receive the reward. Watch a participating stream channel to join the activity. You need to watch Once Human for 3 hours to claim all the rewards. The rewards will be sent to your account in 24 hours.
rewards.name: Valentine's Day Drops

rewards.description: Subscribe or Gift a Sub to your favorite opted-in Destiny 2 streamer and receive the Heretical Halation Emblem! This Emblem will be available from 11 February at 9AM PT until 4 March at 9AM PT. You must link your Bungie account to Twitch to receive the Emblem. You can redeem the Emblem by logging into your Bungie.net account and going to the Partner Rewards section of the Code Redemption area.
